name: why are you texting me right now
name_original: why are you texting me right now
description:
game made for global game jam 2019

instructions:

go to http://tuckie.zone/phone on your phone. Launch the game and input the room code it gives you. Type and hit send on messages to send them to the game

arrow keys: move

z: interact

sorry its so short but hey you try doing a game, a web app and database in 48 hrs lol (why did i do this to myself)
